Bootloader Crimes

Disposable Windows VM Builder

Configure a disposable Windows VM right in your browser. You will receive a tiny, self-bootstrapping image. Check out the presentation to see how this works behind the scenes, or hack on the code yourself!

This UI is still a bit rough in places, but it will produce usable images. I'd be happy to receive any feedback, bug reports or other suggestions either on GitHub or via other channels.
